title: A modified sidelobe blanking beamforming method for ultrasound plane wave imaging
details: L Tong, P Wang, Y Shen, X Shi, J Chen, F Zhao… - The Journal of the …, 2024
abstract: In this paper, an ultrasound beamforming method for plane wave (PW) imaging based on modified sidelobe blanking (MSLB) is proposed to improve image resolution and contrast ratio (CR). In this framework, PWs from various angles were …
